title: Business Intelligence integration
content:
Integration with an external business intelligence (BI) system enables you to export your data to a third-party system with different reporting tools. Alternatively, it's useful for aggregating your data with data from other parts of your organization. 

An advanced solution that leverages OData (Open Data Protocol) is available for you to perform BI integration. For details, see Use OData for BI integration. 

The Business Intelligence (BI) integration module in Service Management also enables you to define the fields and relationships that are synced for a record type when integrating with an external business intelligence system, by using the BI integration API. This method is deprecated.
